mapper.insert: insert into pathological( person_id, unique_id, p900, patient_id, visit_id, case_number, specimen_name, inspect_time, reprot_time, tumor_location, tumor_size, if_original_location, pathological_type, histological_grade, Invasion_vagina, parauterine_tissue, if_artery, if_invasion_nerve, operation, edge_distance, lymph_node_partition, lymph_node_total, transfer_number, if_transfer, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{personId}, #{uniqueId}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{caseNumber}, #{specimenName}, #{inspectTime}, #{reprotTime}, #{tumorLocation}, #{tumorSize}, #{ifOriginalLocation}, #{pathologicalType}, #{histologicalGrade}, #{invasionVagina}, #{parauterineTissue}, #{ifArtery}, #{ifInvasionNerve}, #{operation}, #{edgeDistance}, #{lymphNodePartition}, #{lymphNodeTotal}, #{transferNumber}, #{ifTransfer}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update pathological set person_id = #{personId}, unique_id = #{uniqueId}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, case_number = #{caseNumber}, specimen_name = #{specimenName}, inspect_time = #{inspectTime}, reprot_time = #{reprotTime}, tumor_location = #{tumorLocation}, tumor_size = #{tumorSize}, if_original_location = #{ifOriginalLocation}, pathological_type = #{pathologicalType}, histological_grade = #{histologicalGrade}, Invasion_vagina = #{invasionVagina}, parauterine_tissue = #{parauterineTissue}, if_artery = #{ifArtery}, if_invasion_nerve = #{ifInvasionNerve}, operation = #{operation}, edge_distance = #{edgeDistance}, lymph_node_partition = #{lymphNodePartition}, lymph_node_total = #{lymphNodeTotal}, transfer_number = #{transferNumber}, if_transfer = #{ifTransfer}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
